name: Politoed
author: Naoyo Kimura
flavor_text: Whenever three or more of these get together, they sing in a loud voice that sounds like bellowing.

poke_power.name: Leap Frog
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may choose a {W} Pokémon on your Bench and switch it with your Active Pokémon. This power can’t be used if Politoed is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Big Chorus
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each {W} Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.
